thread.title: Nigerian president Buhari to seek re-election in 2019

title: Nigerian president Buhari to seek re-election in 2019
text:
Nigerian president Buhari to seek re-election in 2019 12:23pm IST - 01:27 
Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari confirmed on Monday he will seek another term in elections next year, ending months of speculation about his future after bouts of ill health.   
Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari confirmed on Monday he will seek another term in elections next year, ending months of speculation about his future after bouts of ill health.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/04/13/nigerian-president-buhari-to-seek-re-ele?videoId=417354156&videoChannel=13423
